anyone know about configuring vnc in ubu: a friend is at a hotspot and i need to help him with something, but vino says it's only accessible on the local network
you would need to be on the same network as your friend, especialy if he is at a hotspot, you'd both need to be on the same lan,

your friend is behind a firewall, teamviewer uses a proxy to connect.... you are limited in what you can do in this case... you would need a proxy to provide a route between him and you, and is probably beyond the level of support you will be able to get here
